home.description: We solve so many problems, challenges and decision making needs every day. But sometimes we encounter situations that require a closer look - and maybe a fresh perspective. Let's discover it together!

about.description: I am a professional coach with over 10 years of experience helping individuals achieve their personal and professional goals. My approach combines proven techniques with personalized strategies tailored to your unique situation.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: Coaching is a collaborative process that helps individuals identify and achieve their personal and professional goals through guided self-discovery and actionable strategies.
faq.answer2: Typical coaching sessions last 60 minutes, but can be adjusted based on your needs and preferences.
faq.question3: How many sessions will I need?
faq.answer3: The number of sessions varies depending on your goals and progress. We'll discuss this during our initial consultation.
faq.answer4: My coaching methodology combines evidence-based techniques from positive psychology, cognitive-behavioral approaches, and solution-focused strategies.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Get in touch for more information or to schedule a session
contact.success_message: Your message has been sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon.
contact.error_message: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

prices.title: Pricing
prices.description: Transparent pricing for all coaching services
prices.package3_description: 12 sessions over 3 months plus email support
prices.note: All prices are in USD. Payment plans available upon request.
